item.description:
We are VERY fortunate to have as our guest speaker, Jim Greenwood, President and CEO of the Biotechnology Industry Organization (BIO) in Washington, D.C.

Don't miss this opportunity to talk with one of the leaders of our industry.

Jim is head of biotechnology's largest national trade association and has his finger on the pulse of the industry on everything from science to finance to public policy.

Jim will give a short talk on what he sees is in store for biotechnology in 2009 -- both in the Bay area as well as nationally.

Be sure to RSVP today ... and be sure to encourage other biotech enthusiasts in the community to join in this special opportunity.
item.name: What's Ahead for Biotech in 2009 ...
